description: Program to apply a nonlinear 3D warp saved from 3dQwarp (or 3dNwarpCat, etc.) to a 3D dataset, to produce a warped version of the source dataset.

nwarp.title: Nonlinear Warp
nwarp.description: The name of the 3D warp dataset. Multiple warps can be catenated.

source.title: Source Dataset
source.description: The name of the source dataset to be warped. Multiple datasets can be supplied.

master.title: Master Dataset
master.description: The name of the master dataset which defines the output grid.

newgrid.title: New Grid Spacing
newgrid.description: The new grid spacing (cubical voxels, in mm).

dxyz.title: Grid Spacing
dxyz.description: Specify a different grid spacing (cubical voxels, in mm).

ainterp.title: Alternative Interpolation Mode
ainterp.description: Specify a different interpolation mode for the data than the warp.

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: The name of the new output dataset. Multiple names can be supplied if more than one source dataset is input.

suffix.title: Output Suffix
suffix.description: Change the default suffix '_Nwarp' to a user-defined suffix.

short.title: Short Output Flag
short.description: Write output dataset using 16-bit short integers rather than the usual 32-bit floats.

wprefix.title: Warp Prefix
wprefix.description: Save every warp generated in the process to a separate dataset.
